name: Williams Murray Hamm
description:
WMH invents and reinvents brands. Aiming to create more imaginative and inventive brands than the usual tired clichés and herd thinking their clients get from many of today’s brand agencies.
A hothouse of creative thinkers from Dutch architects and French business graduates to British advertising planners and branding designers.
WWH it’s different than other companies in the business. With over 200 awards for creativity and effectiveness since 1997.
